definitions: The act of cutting, trimming, or severing something with shears or clippers.
The act of attaching or fastening something with a clip.
The act of removing or shortening part of a word or phrase.
The act of striking or hitting something lightly and quickly.
examples: The barber was clipping his hair.
She was clipping the papers together.
He was clipping words from the sentence.
The ball was clipping the top of the net.
